title: Use default HostnameVerifier of HttpsURLConnection
message:
Use default HostnameVerifier of HttpsURLConnection

* don't use BrowserCompatHostnameVerifier (seems to be a stub now) but
  only wrap the default HostnameVerifier, whatever it is (fixes #21)
* API level increased to 22

title: Version 1.0.2
message:
Version 1.0.2

Allow TLSv1, TLSv1.1, TLSv1.2 and disable SSLv3 for Android <5.0 (fixes #14)

title: Reusing http connections are buggy with versions before Android 4.1
message:
Reusing http connections are buggy with versions before Android 4.1

applies for versions before Android 4.1 (API level 16) and poor server configuration.

solves issue https://github.com/bitfireAT/cadroid/issues/18

title: Bugfix for devices with versions below Android 4.4 reworked
message:
Bugfix for devices with versions below Android 4.4 reworked

App could crash or header view could just be not selectable.
This bugfix only applies for Android devices with versions below 4.4 (KitKat).

see also: https://developer.android.com/reference/android/widget/ListView.html#addHeaderView%28android.view.View%29

title: README updates
message: README updates

title: minor changes
message:
minor changes

* added ProGuard file
* minor code optimizations
* allow gradle to build with lint errors

title: Support certificate chains
message:
Support certificate chains

* allow selecting the certificate to import from the certificate chain
* don't distinguish between CA and self-signed certificates anymore
* error messages for invalid host name and already trusted chain moved to certificate selection
* don't follow redirects (see issue #13)
* display fingerprints correctly (closes #11, closes #12)
* minor improvements

title: Switch to gradle/Android Studio, version bump to 0.9.9
message: Switch to gradle/Android Studio, version bump to 0.9.9

title: Allow scrolling in "Import cert" fragment
message:
Allow scrolling in "Import cert" fragment

* minor i18n fixes
* version bump to 0.9.1

title: Rewritten core
message:
Rewritten core

* support stand-alone (chain length: 1) or own CA (chain length > 1) certificates
* use Lombok
* decode Basic Constraints correctly with own ASN.1/DER decoder
* detect whether certificates are already trusted locally
* ignore HTTP errors when fetching the certificate
* try to give more useful information in error messages
* better GUI/core separation
* German translation
* tests
* version bump to 0.9

title: Use Bouncy Castle
message:
Use Bouncy Castle

* basic constraints: detect CA flag and path length independently
* show subject alternative names
* libs: add Bouncy Castle and Apache Commons Lang
